meanings.sent1: I lost my titfer at the park.
meanings.sent2: She wore a stylish titfer to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat on the titfer and looked quite puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The titfer of clouds covered the sky, shielding the sun.
meanings.sent5: His titfer was as red as a ripe apple, standing out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: Dad will titfer his cap before going out.
meanings.sent2: Please titfer your helmet before riding the bike.
meanings.sent3: The magician titfered a rabbit out of his hat!
meanings.sent4: She titfered her thoughts carefully before speaking.
meanings.sent5: Titfer your head with a hat to protect from the sun's rays.
